vachievements.label: Under An Appreciable Mental Strain
vachievements.description: I no longer have any idea what is real, and what is not.

vachievements.label: The Clock Striketh Twelve
vachievements.description: I honoured my agreement, but I did not have a friend.

vachievements.label: I'm Not... *Unhappy*
vachievements.description: I worked. I slaved. I lived a sort of life.

vachievements.label: Corner Office
vachievements.description: I will be honoured by my peers. And then, one day, I'll die.

vachievements.label: Where Will They Find Me?
vachievements.description: My body died. Perhaps my spirit entered the Mansus.

vachievements.label: No Worst, There Is None
vachievements.description: Despair, the wolf that devours thought, devoured me.

vachievements.label: Bars Across the Sun
vachievements.description: My trial was contentious. But thanks to the Inspector, here I am.

vachievements.label: SUMMON ALIEN GODS
vachievements.description: I conjured a creature from beyond the skin of the world.

vachievements.label: In the Midst of my Life, in a Dark Wood
vachievements.description: The Wood grows around the walls of the Mansus. As any student of Histories knows, the Mansus has no walls.

vachievements.label: Speechless at Sunset
vachievements.description: Speech may not pass the White Door, but I may.

vachievements.label: What Has It Got In Its Pocketses?
vachievements.description: I have answered the riddle of the Stag Door, and am counted among the Know.

vachievements.label: Beaded with Blood
vachievements.description: I have made the necessary sacrifice to enter the Mansus through the Spider Door.

vachievements.label: In the Glassgarden
vachievements.description: It has pleased the Peacock Door to yield to my entry.

vachievements.label: Hairless and Imperishable
vachievements.description: I wrestled the Forge to victory. I will not grow old.

vachievements.label: Hairless and Semi-Perishable
vachievements.description: We wrestled the Forge to victory. We will not grow old.

vachievements.label: Smooth Without, Red Within
vachievements.description: I gorged on the fruits of the sticky Grail. I will not grow old.

vachievements.label: Smooth Without, Dead Within
vachievements.description: We gorged on the fruits of the sticky Grail. We will not grow old.

vachievements.label: Thine be the Glory
vachievements.description: I walked behind the Watchman. I will not grow old.

vachievements.label: Thine be the Ghoul
vachievements.description: We walked behind the Watchman. We will not grow old.

vachievements.label: Breaking Dawn
vachievements.description: I was consumed, but another I rose higher

vachievements.label: I, the Feast
vachievements.description: I was devoured, but another I rose higher

vachievements.label: The Third Way
vachievements.description: I was lost to another I's glory

vachievements.label: The Sun Before Me
vachievements.description: The Sun has his course, and so do I.

vachievements.label: A Seer
vachievements.description: I cast a believer onto the Lantern's path.

vachievements.label: A Reshaper
vachievements.description: I shaped a mighty believer from the fires of the Forge.

vachievements.label: An Assassin
vachievements.description: I sharpened a believer to their deadliest Edge.

vachievements.label: A Tarantellist
vachievements.description: I drew a believer to the endless Dance of the Heart.

vachievements.label: A Cyprian
vachievements.description: I pledged a believer to the Feast of the Grail.

vachievements.label: A Skintwister
vachievements.description: I led a believer to the Wood of the Moth.

vachievements.label: A Key
vachievements.description: I forged a believer into a true instrument of Knock.

vachievements.label: Mirror of Glory
vachievements.description: I dedicated myself to the understanding of the Light that leaks from a fiercer place.

vachievements.label: Unflinching Order
vachievements.description: I dedicated myself to the fire that changes and remakes.

vachievements.label: Church of the Bright Edge
vachievements.description: I dedicated myself to the Hours of struggle and conquest.

vachievements.label: Children of Silence
vachievements.description: I dedicated myself to the silence that comes and the cold that ends.

vachievements.label: Temple Unceasing
vachievements.description: I dedicated myself to the drumbeat which can never end.

vachievements.label: Order of the Bloody Cup
vachievements.description: I dedicated myself to the mysteries of birth, blood and appetite.

vachievements.label: Wildwood Club
vachievements.description: I dedicated myself to chaos, and the unexpected Hours.

vachievements.label: Society of the Holy Wound
vachievements.description: I dedicated myself to the Hours which open doors.

vachievements.label: Society of St Hydra
vachievements.description: I dedicated myself to the study of the five Histories, and their thousand demi-real branches.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Me
vachievements.description: I am a successful trophy.

vachievements.label: The Dodo and the Dragon
vachievements.description: I have become something winged, dark and undying; something that no longer exists.

vachievements.label: The Dodo and the Draugr
vachievements.description: We have become something winged, dark and undying; something that no longer exists.

vachievements.label: My Constancy Assured
vachievements.description: I have joined the storm-chorus of the Thunderskin. Never shall I cease.

vachievements.label: Our Constancy Assured
vachievements.description: We have joined the storm-chorus of the Thunderskin. Never shall we cease.

vachievements.label: The House of the Moon
vachievements.description: The Meniscate favoured me.

vachievements.label: The House of My Moon
vachievements.description: The Meniscate favoured us.

vachievements.label: Unsealed and Unseamed
vachievements.description: In the Fifth History alone, I will rise like a wave and hood myself to mark what I have become.

vachievements.label: The Mare and Me
vachievements.description: This is when I would have died, but my wounds were doors.

vachievements.label: Nothing Must Be Forgotten
vachievements.description: I carry the colours of lost Hours with me like a coal of rosy fire.

vachievements.label: All The Infections That The Sun Sucks Up
vachievements.description: I have taken the seeds of the Crowned Growth into me.

vachievements.label: Call It A Christmas Present
vachievements.description: I don't think it really qualifies as a cadaver, so much as a souvenir.

vachievements.label: The Other Side of the World
vachievements.description: I couldn't risk them picking up the trail again.

vachievements.label: The Sweet Bones
vachievements.description: NO RECKONERS, NO EXCEPTIONS.

vachievements.label: Velvet House
vachievements.description: I've been poor, I've been rich, and I've learnt that I'd rather be rich.

vachievements.label: Only the Best
vachievements.description: 'I have one very specific recommendation for the contract...'

vachievements.label: Employment Opportunities
vachievements.description: Somehow I can't stop thinking about it...

vachievements.label: Keep the Sunset Company
vachievements.description: There's a lot of the world, and it's not all mapped yet.

vachievements.label: Eternity's Sustention
vachievements.description: The Corrivality is the world's engine.

vachievements.label: Too Much Fun
vachievements.description: The opposite of battle is death.

vachievements.label: Fire's Final Function
vachievements.description: The Wolf and all the wandering flames will feast.

vachievements.label: Kinship
vachievements.description: Any student of Histories knows: as within, so without. One way or another.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Tristan
vachievements.description: Our flesh may tire. We may grow old. But I will not regret.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Valciane
vachievements.description: She wants very much to be found.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Laidlaw
vachievements.description: We find, we think, a way.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Elridge
vachievements.description: I may give him his reward.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Rose
vachievements.description: We seem a suited pair.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Victor
vachievements.description: We are happy, I think.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Saliba
vachievements.description: I would not say it ended badly.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Renira
vachievements.description: I am drunk with her.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Violet
vachievements.description: One by one we douse the flames.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Auclair
vachievements.description: Now we are scholars of the heart.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Enid
vachievements.description: I am well repaid.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Neville
vachievements.description: He thanks me afterwards.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Cat
vachievements.description: She ensures I have sweet dreams.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Clifton
vachievements.description: It is hard to tell, with him, whether to laugh or cry.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Slee
vachievements.description: Our home is littered with his notes.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Porter
vachievements.description: That is enough.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Ysabet
vachievements.description: Our house is home to fluttering things.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Sylvia
vachievements.description: Life is not easy with her.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Clovette
vachievements.description: Our heartbeats quicken together.

vachievements.label: Ever After: Dorothy
vachievements.description: We dream the same pink dreams.

vachievements.label: Ever after: Leo
vachievements.description: He is the melody of love, and I hear him now.
